data.message: Hello Facebook Can you help me why i can't change my name on Facebook i was change my name before 4-5 months! Please i want change my name to another help please.

replies.message: Hey there. You may be unable to change your name for a number of reasons. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2fAzyKQ. -Nick
